properties.areaDesc: Grant, AR; Hot Spring, AR; Cleveland, AR; Dallas, AR; Saline, AR; Jefferson, AR
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 11 at 12:32AM CST until January 11 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Northwestern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas...
Grant County in central Arkansas...
Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas...
Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas...
Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas...
Eastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas...

* Until 330 AM CST.

* At 1230 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms
producing torrential downpours across the warned area. One to two
inches of rain per hour is likely, with flash flooding in places.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Malvern...                        Sheridan...
Fordyce...                        Redfield...
Rockport...                       Traskwood...
Leola...                          Tull...
Sparkman...                       Carthage...
Prattsville...                    Poyen...
Perla...                          Cane Creek...
Jenkins Ferry State Park...       Orion...
Dogwood...                        Lamont...
Thiel...                          Hensley Island...
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:30 AM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
